forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West wind 16 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind 17 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco tonight enjoys a veil of clarity, with only the faintest whisperings of fog lingering in the cooler evening air. As the sun retreats, the city’s skyline stands proud against a backdrop of deepening twilight, embellished occasionally by the soft brush of a west wind, which dances playfully through the streets at around 16 to 20 miles per hour. The temperature settles into a gentle chill, perfect for a light sweater or a cozy jacket, enveloping you in comfort as you step out.

Looking ahead to Friday, the promise of a sunlit day draws near. Expect a high near 64, as the morning clears to reveal the golden warmth of the sun. Those winds will pick up slightly, reminding us of the coastal nature surrounding this vibrant city, with gusts that may flirt with the thirties at times. With the sun gracing the sky and a touch of breeze in the air, it could be a delightful time for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet café visit, where one may savor the aroma of freshly brewed coffee while watching the world go by. Perfectly suited for the occasion, a light layer will keep you comfortable as you embrace the delightful San Francisco charm.
